page.title: 15ST JOHN'S SCHOOL MARLBOROUGH
page.content: The school was opened in 1948 as a {secondary modern school}with 149 pupils.The first headmaster was Mr A. Brown.In 1975 the school became {comprehensive.}This building is the {lower school}for years 1_3.Now there are about 700 pupils, with 77 full time teachers and 7 part time.There are 18 secretaries, caretakers etc. There are 33{classrooms}including special rooms for cooking, needlework, woodwork, metalwork, gym, library, music, art and science. A{school day}is about 7 hours long. Morning break is from 10.20_10.35. Dinner break is from 11.45_12.55 and afternoon break is from 2.15_2.30. Every day there are 8{lessons}each of 35 minutes.Subjects include history, geography, maths, english, practicals, RE, science, french, PE and games. The top set for french do latin as well.
